text:
Sr/Lead Devops Engineer | Coffee Meets Bagel | San Francisco | Full-Time | On-site |

Coffee Meets Bagel is a dating app that focuses on quality over quantity. We're growing fast and looking for an experienced devops engineer to help us build a fully automated scaling, self-healing, infrastructure as code.

Our stack is Python, C*, Redis, Elastic Search, PG, Ansible, Nginx, AWS, ...

We have a super fun office in SOMA right off the BART line and you'd get to work with a bunch of very smart, driven, passionate, and fun people all dedicated to helping our users find love!

https://jobs.lever.co/coffeemeetsbagel/e0982ead-c870-411a-ac...
